elements.name: Atomicfile
elements.longDescription:
'name': arbitrary name
'description': arbitrary description
'appversion': version of the application
'graph': list of applications. Strings may either match a local graph sub directory or an application metadata container that can be pulled via docker.
'specversion': version of this specification, ex. 'v1-alpha'

elements.name: README
elements.shortDescription: information for deploying this application targetted towards deployment ops sysadmin
elements.longDescription: The README describes the application in enough detail so an operator can make parameterization and other deployment decisions.

elements.name: Dockerfile
elements.shortDescription: standard packaging for this application metadata

elements.name: Parameters
elements.longDescription: Each application listed in the graph may optionally have a parameters section, for example [myapp]. Application-specific parameters override general parameters.

elements.name: graph
elements.shortDescription: directories of applications referenced in Atomicfile separated by provisioning provider

contents.name: application
contents.shortDescription: a directory whose name matches the graph list in the Atomicfile

contents.name: provider
contents.shortDescription: a directory whose name matches a list of container or orchestration technologies available in selected implementation

contents.name: provider files
contents.shortDescription: provider-specific files necessary for deploying to provider, e.g. kubernetes pod and service files

contents.name: Parameters
contents.shortDescription: runtime parameters for this particular application
contents.longDescription: These parameters are concatenated with the larger application definition parameters. Parameters defined here may be overriden by the larger applications parameters. There must only be a single section defined which matches the application name.
